body.name: YAHARBO White Nightstand with Charging Station, Small Bedside Tables with USB Ports and Power Outlets, Modern End Table with Drawer, Night Stand for Bedrooms, Offices, Small Spaces

features: [Nightstand with Charging Station] Still worried about not having enough charging outlets? Our white nightstands are designed with 2 USB ports and 2 power outlets, enough for you to charge your cell phone, desk lamp, and tablet, fully satisfying your charging needs.

[Nightstand with Large Storage Space] Our 3 tier small bed side tables have a large capacity drawer, a wide storage shelf and table top, and the edge of the night stands table top protective design can prevent items placed on the bedroom nightstand table top from falling off, you can use the modern end tables to store anything you like.

[Enjoy the Relaxing Time] The narrow end table can be placed in any corner of the room or office and other small spaces. You can put the tiny cute night stand next to your sofa, then sit on the sofa and watch a book or TV, take a sip of tea or coffee placed on the living room side table and have a relax. Wow！ What a wonderful time！

[Safe and Sturdy] Our wood bedside table is made of sturdy high-quality wooden board materials, which can protect your family's safety and health! And 4 round shape adjustable legs protect the floor from scratches and ensure stability on uneven flat surfaces. You can use it confidently. Product size: 11.8"D x 16.7"W x 24"H.

[Easy to Assemble] Complete instructions, numbered parts and L-shaped Allen wrench ensure the assemble process smooth and simple. Helps you install nightstand faster and reduces installation time. We provide professional after-sale service. Your issue will be resolved within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price for quality
reviews.reviewText: It is very easy to put together. Also, it is nice having the charger port on top. I would say it would be nice to have something to cover the chargers built in, but overall it is serving its purpose! Looks great too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect little side table for my living room. I needed something with a plug since I have a sectional and I need the plug on the table for various machines I need to use. It’s nice to be able to charge my phone and tablets. Nice little drawer. Pretty sturdy. The instructions aren’t bad at all, just take your time and pay attention to the holes. I recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Functional and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Very good figures for straightforward construction. Small but functional. I agree (with many other reviewers) that the drawer is clunky to move. The top material is smartly pebbled to keep clean. Overall good value for money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this product it was easy to put together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect charging table for a small space
reviews.reviewText: This little table was not easy to assemble (at least not for me), but I only had to redo it once, so I guess that's really not too bad. I'm also ticked off because the post office misdelivered the package, and insisted it was in the mailbox; eventually a neighbor dropped it off. That's certainly not the manufacturer's fault, but I wanted to complain to someone. Overall, this is a great little table, and well worth the time to put it together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Disappointing Charging Performance
reviews.reviewText: I purchased it in July last year, and initially, I was impressed with its sturdiness and secure drawers. The convenience of having four outlets (two USB and two regular) for charging devices was a my most favorite point. However, after just about four months of use, I've encountered a significant issue with the charging capability. Despite using only one USB charger, the charging speed has dramatically decreased. It now takes nearly four to five hours to charge a single phone. I have confirmed that there are no issues with the charging adapter itself. This unexpected decline in performance is disappointing, especially considering the positive experience I had initially.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This item is perfect for what we needed. It is very convenient to have the charging outlets available on the top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple and Functional
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to create an under table media station for Mac Studio. It's sturdy, discrete, and functional. Assembly was a bit of a challenge only because the first step is not explained clearly; but if you're a smart person you could tell that it's a box. The other challenge is that there are no dowels to hold pieces in place so if you're not careful you could break the wood while screwing something in. It's definitely not IKEA. The screws and bolts are visibly apparent and are not hidden.The manufacture might have an error in it's process. The first order I had missing bolt insets. These are the metal pieces inside the wood that help bind the bolt frame together. I had to return my order and ordered another one which had no issues.I did not buy this to be a hallmark furniture piece to show off. It's meant to be hidden. It is not fancy.

These are super nice! Very simple to put together. I don’t even mind that the screws are exposed because that is why it’s simple to put together, and no one will ever notice that! For the price these are a great sturdy night stand. I wasted a lot of time putting together junky jysk furniture, these only took me an hour for both.
